Americans shouldn’t have to navigate different states’ bureaucracies in order to bear arms – a right enshrined in our U.S. Constitution by the Second Amendment. Signing onto this bill is a no-brainer.

Meanwhile, 132 bipartisan members of Congress are working to protect your rights with the Concealed Carry Reciprocity Act -- a common sense bill allows law-abiding citizens who are qualified to conceal carry in one state also carry in other states that allow residents to do so.

Progressive House Democrats are readying attacks on the 2A and Americans’ constitutional rights. They are:
